name: City Hive
author: City Hive

sections.description:
City Hive platform augments any website with a fully functional, universal point of sale and delivers targeted offers that can be sold directly to end users without redirection to a 3rd party site.
The City Hive platform utilizes its patent pending technology along with location sensitivity, proprietary machine learning algorithms and data analytics in order to leverage the power of the company’s rapidly expanding retail network and enable the sale of wine and spirits online.
City Hive’s turnkey solution enables clients to utilize existing infrastructure to monetize content and/or sell products online.

The City Hive affiliate program plugin allows partners to automatically present content related product on their blog posts and earn money promoting local products to their readers.
The WordPress plugin automatically presents related product according to each blog post content and visitor’s location.
City Hive plugin allows to manually search and set related product through the edit post administration panel. City Hive plugin match any device and any design.

Current locations:

  • New York City
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘City Hive’
  3. Activate City Hive from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download City Hive.
  2. Upload the ‘city-hive’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate City Hive from your Plugins page.

Once Activated

  1. In admin panel, go to ‘Settings’
  2. Press ‘City Hive Settings’
  3. Under ‘Get your API key’, Press the ‘Get your API key’ button and fill in the form
  4. Enter your key in ‘Enter your API key’
  5. Save
sections.changelog:
0.2.3

  • Updated readme.txt

0.2.2

  • Changed the default API key behavior – If no API is set, It’ll use the default one

0.2.1

  • UI fixes

0.2

  • Updated plugin to support the new API key.
  • UI fixes

0.1.9

merging files.

0.1.8

Not allowing adding the same product/producer twice

0.1.7

Fixed remove product issue

0.1.6

Fixed remove producer issue

0.1.5

Fixing errors on creating a new post

0.1.4

  • Added ‘view page with city hive widget’ button to content edit page
  • Layout changes in admin city hive meta box
  • Fix noshow tag in multiple posts

0.1.3

  • Show meta box on pages (and posts)

0.1.2

  • Scroll bar added to search window in edit post

0.1.1

  • Added option to choose producers
  • Added option not to show products
  • typeahead upgraded to version 11.1

0.1

  • Initial release (tested & working on production sites).
